page.title: 13LIFE STYLES (CONT)
page.content: SPORT: We found out how interested people were in sport through the media. People in Block A were more interested than those in Block B. Tennis was the most popular followed by cricket, golf and rugby. In the two blocks people who actively participated in sport preferred tennis, followed by cricket, football and rugby. People from Block A played the most sport. HOLIDAYS: Everyone in Block A went on holiday abroad every year. 40% had additional holidays in Britain. They stayed in hotels (50%), with relations (21%), villas (14%), caravans (7%) camping (7%). In Block B, 10% had no annual holiday, 70% went abroad, 20% stayed in Britain. Hotels (33%), caravans (33%), with relations (22%) camping (12%).
